text: Liebling is the second studio album by Swedish musician Andreas Johnson. It was released on 25 May 1999 through Warner Music Group. ==Track listing== #"Glorious" #"People" #"The Games We Play" #"Do You Believe in Heaven" #"Should Have Been Me" #"Breathing" #"Patiently" #"Spaceless" #"Please (Do Me Right)" #"Safe from Harm" #"Unbreakable" ==Contributors== *Andreas Johnson - vocals, guitar *Peter Kvint - guitar, keyboard, song *Jerker Odelholm - bass *Andreas Dahlbäck - drums, percussion ==Charts== {| class="wikitable sortable" ! Chart (1999-2000, 2004) ! title: Liebling (album)
